lessons.name: Nouns
lessons.explanation: Nouns are words that name people, places, things, or ideas. They can be singular or plural, countable or uncountable, proper or common.

lessons.name: Pronouns
lessons.explanation: Pronouns are words that replace nouns in a sentence. Types include personal, possessive, reflexive, and more.

lessons.name: Verbs
lessons.explanation: Verbs are words that show action or a state of being. Types include action, linking, and auxiliary verbs.

lessons.name: Adjectives
lessons.explanation: Adjectives describe or modify nouns. They can show quality, quantity, or comparison.
